kv2.5:1.3: Sabbattha samāpannānaṃ atthi vacībhedoti, na hevaṃ vattabbe …pe…
kv2.5:12.1: ☑ Samudayoti jānanto na ca samudayoti vācaṃ bhāsatīti?
kv2.5:12.3: Dukkhanti jānanto na ca dukkhanti vācaṃ bhāsatīti?
kv2.5:13.1: ☑ Nirodhoti jānanto na ca nirodhoti vācaṃ bhāsatīti?
kv2.5:13.3: Dukkhanti jānanto na ca dukkhanti vācaṃ bhāsatīti?
kv2.5:14.1: ☑ Maggoti jānanto na ca maggoti vācaṃ bhāsatīti?
kv2.5:14.3: Dukkhanti jānanto na ca dukkhanti vācaṃ bhāsatīti?
kv2.5:17.1: ☑ Samāpannassa atthi vacībhedo ñāṇaṃ saccagocaraṃ, sotaṃ saddagocaranti?
kv2.5:17.3: Hañci ñāṇaṃ saccagocaraṃ, sotaṃ saddagocaraṃ, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.5:18.1: ☑ Samāpannassa atthi vacībhedo ñāṇaṃ saccagocaraṃ, sotaṃ saddagocaranti?
kv2.5:18.3: Dvinnaṃ phassānaṃ, dvinnaṃ vedanānaṃ, dvinnaṃ saññānaṃ, dvinnaṃ cetanānaṃ, dvinnaṃ cittānaṃ samodhānaṃ hotīti?
kv2.5:21.3: Hañci pathavīkasiṇaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa natthi vacībhedo, no ca vata re vattabbe “samāpannassa atthi vacībhedo”ti.
kv2.5:22.13: Hañci nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa natthi vacībhedo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.5:24.3: Lokiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:25.3: Hañci lokiyaṃ samāpattiṃ samāpannassa natthi vacībhedo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.5:26.1: ☑ Lokiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa natthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:26.3: Hañci lokiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa natthi vacībhedo, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.5:27.5: Hañci lokiyaṃ catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa natthi vacībhedo, no ca vata re vattabbe “samāpannassa atthi vacībhedo”ti.
kv2.5:28.1: ☑ Lokuttaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:28.3: Lokiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:29.1: ☑ Lokuttaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:30.1: ☑ Lokiyaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa natthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:30.3: Lokuttaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa natthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:31.5: Lokuttaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa natthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:32.1: ☑ Lokuttaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:32.3: Lokuttaraṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:33.1: ☑ Lokuttaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:34.1: ☑ Lokuttaraṃ dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa natthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:34.3: Lokuttaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa natthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:35.5: Lokuttaraṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa natthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:36.8: “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vitakkavicārā”, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv2.5:37.2: “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vitakkavicārā”ti, atthi tassa vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:37.4: Pathavīkasiṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vitakkavicārā, atthi tassa vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:38.2: “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vitakkavicārā”ti, atthi tassa vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:38.10: odātakasiṇaṃ paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vitakkavicārā, atthi tassa vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:39.8: “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vitakkavicārā”, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv2.5:40.2: “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vitakkavicārā”ti, atthi tassa vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:40.5: “dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi saññā, atthi tassa vitakkavicārā”ti?
kv2.5:41.2: “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa atthi vitakkavicārā”ti, atthi tassa vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:41.9: ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa atthi saññā, atthi tassa vitakkavicārāti?
kv2.5:42.3: Nanu “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hotī”ti.
kv2.5:42.6: Hañci “paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hotī”ti, attheva suttantoti, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv2.5:43.1: ☑ “Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hotī”ti, attheva suttantoti, atthi tassa vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:43.3: “Dutiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vitakkavicārā niruddhā hontī”ti, attheva suttantoti, atthi tassa vitakkavicārāti?
kv2.5:44.1: ☑ “Paṭhamaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa vācā niruddhā hotī”ti, attheva suttantoti, atthi tassa vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:44.3: “Tatiyaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa pīti niruddhā hoti, catutthaṃ jhānaṃ samāpannassa assāsapassāsā niruddhā honti, ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samāpannassa rūpasaññā niruddhā hoti, viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpannassa ākāsānañcāyatanasaññā niruddhā hoti, ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa viññāṇañcāyatanasaññā niruddhā hoti, nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā niruddhā hoti, saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca niruddhā hontī”ti, attheva suttantoti, atthi tassa saññā ca vedanā cāti?
kv2.5:45.7: Hañci paṭhamassa jhānassa saddo kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā, tena vata re vattabbe—
kv2.5:46.1: ☑ Paṭhamassa jhānassa saddo kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatāti, samāpannassa atthi vacībhedoti?
kv2.5:46.3: Dutiyassa jhānassa vitakkavicārā kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā …
kv2.5:46.4: tatiyassa jhānassa pīti kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā …
kv2.5:46.5: catutthassa jhānassa assāsapassāsā kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā …
kv2.5:46.6: ākāsānañcāyatanaṃ samāpannassa rūpasaññā kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā …
kv2.5:46.7: viññāṇañcāyatanaṃ samāpannassa ākāsānañcāyatanasaññā kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā …
kv2.5:46.8: ākiñcaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa viññāṇañcāyatanasaññā kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā …
kv2.5:46.9: nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṃ samāpannassa ākiñcaññāyatanasaññā kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā …
kv2.5:46.10: saññāvedayitanirodhaṃ samāpannassa saññā ca vedanā ca kaṇḍako vutto bhagavatā, atthi tassa saññā ca vedanā cāti?
kv2.5:47.5: “sikhissa, ānanda, bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa abhibhū nāma sāvako brahmaloke ṭhito dasasahassilokadhātuṃ sarena viññāpesi—
